content: At the top of the slope, two Censor Holders and a Supporter Monk are praying to statues of Turtle and Snake General, and you can ignore them or unleash a surprise attack if you wish.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Entrance'.
The content is as follows:
At the top of the slope, two Censor Holders and a Supporter Monk are praying to statues of Turtle and Snake General, and you can ignore them or unleash a surprise attack if you wish.
